FuncDef: This command enables PIM on an interface and enables the context to configure interface-specific parameters. By default interfaces are activated in PIM based on theapply-tocommand, and do not have to be configured on an individual basis unless the default values must be changed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interface name. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes.

ExtraInfo: Default: Interfaces are activated in PIM based on the apply-to command.
